text: Hi all i am new to HubSpot and not sure where to start I have watched the tutorials on the HubSpot Academy but does anyone have a great tutorial paid of free to get started building a website with the HubSpot template, How to create a home page, Header with navigation drop down etc.. etc..

Hey <@U02560WJ2GG> I recommend taking this tutorial: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started>

When your done we have a bunch of tutorials at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides>

Additionally some developers like to look through the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate|HubSpot boilerplate>, which is a bare-bones website theme you can start from which gets great scores for performance right off the bat.
